mapper.select: select ov.id, ov.seller_id, ov.title, ov.text, ov.price, ov.cover_image_path, -- 查询与此 order_view 关联的所有图片路径 (select GROUP_CONCAT(image_path) from order_view_image where order_view_id = ov.id) as imagePathList, -- 查询与此 order_view 关联的所有标签 (select GROUP_CONCAT(text) from order_view_tag where order_view_id = ov.id) as tagList from order_view ov where ov.id = #{id};

select ov.id, ov.seller_id, ov.title, ov.text, ov.price, ov.cover_image_path, -- 查询与此 order_view 关联的所有图片路径 (select GROUP_CONCAT(image_path) from order_view_image where order_view_id = ov.id) as imagePathList, -- 查询与此 order_view 关联的所有标签 (select GROUP_CONCAT(text) from order_view_tag where order_view_id = ov.id) as tagList from order_view ov where ov.seller_id = #{sellerId};

select ov.id, ov.seller_id, ov.title, ov.text, ov.price, ov.cover_image_path, -- 查询与此 order_view 关联的所有图片路径 (select GROUP_CONCAT(image_path) from order_view_image where order_view_id = ov.id) as imagePathList, -- 查询与此 order_view 关联的所有标签 (select GROUP_CONCAT(text) from order_view_tag where order_view_id = ov.id) as tagList, u.username from order_view ov join user u on ov.seller_id = u.id
